name: Monkey Pickles
tag_list: social-media, online-community, facebook, consulting, agency, social-news, goofball, seo, wordpress
overview:
Monkey Pickles is a fun online social community and social media marketing agency.

Started and still is a fun social community in Mar. 09’ through the enjoyment and passion of building a incredible following we choose to start to help other companies do the same. through the process we learned to marry our love of strategy with all facets of online marketing.

Our niche as an agency is we work with companies side by side from their first steps, train them, execute a marketing plan for 1 year. Not all resources work for every industry or client its our job to help you make those decisions with why and why not then execute.
